creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
markings: framing label TC verso of frame: PSG FRAMING / .../ November 2020 / .../ Ultra-Violet Filtering Plexiglas
medium: Color inkjet print with hand-applied watercolor on paper
signed: BR, graphite: All The Wars In The World / (Fire) / Come and Get me! / Alice Aycock / 2020
text: Orange, red, and blue semi-abstract composition featuring a fire-infused vortex of kitchen implements the artist selected from a book entitled "Cook's Tools." Stressing fantasy and imagination over realism, the work presents a playful, three-dimensional allusion of fire and objects in motion though an undefined space.
title: All the Wars in the World (Fire): Come and Get Me
